Subject: Limiting Reports
Description: I am running an Access report on a specific security group. I go to the site and go to the Access tab then search for the group. I go the Permissions under Reports and select Include Inherited and I get 100,000 rows. Is there a way to change the scope to something such as the Server Name so that I can see all rows? If so I can just do it by each server but it hits a limit and I cannot see everything that I need
Solution_Comment__c:
[Initial Issue]
The customer is unable to export reports from the AIC

[Resolution]
We allowed browser pop-ups so the download can start

[Secondary Issue]
The customer is unable to export large (700k+ rows) excel reports from the AIC

[Root Cause]
This is a product limitation because the AIC is a 32-bit process with a max. usable memory of 2GB. The practical limit for excel reports in 64k rows.

[Resolution]
Customer can download large reports in the .csv format, but not Excel
